sentences.en: He disprove the major contention of his opponents.
sentences.cn: 他驳不倒对方的主要论点.

sentences.en: It'seemed to Catherine that if she were his sister she would disprove this axiom.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳觉得如果她是他的姐姐,她就会反对这条通则.

sentences.en: Its popularity seems to disprove the charge that Hollywood " trivialises " mental disorders, Dr Bernstein says.
sentences.cn: 伯恩斯坦说,该方法的普及似乎驳斥了对好莱坞使精神失常问题“显得琐碎无聊 ” 的责难.

sentences.en: Scientists cannot test for the presence of design, nor can they disprove the presence of design.
sentences.cn: 科学家无法验证设计的存在, 也无法反驳设计的存在.

sentences.en: The allegations have been completely disprove.
sentences.cn: 这些指控完全是无中生有.

sentences.en: Their statement incorrect we disprove as follow.
sentences.cn: 他们的陈述不正确,现提反对意见如下.
这些数据证明史密斯的论点是错误的。

trans.tran_en: to show that something is wrong or not true
to show that something is wrong or not true
